game.name: WWE 2K25
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, In-App Purchases, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together
game.shortDescription: 쇼케이스에서 Bloodline의 유구한 역사를 찬양하세요. MyGM을 통해 온라인에서 경쟁하세요. 혼성 레슬링, 체인 레슬링, 바리게이트 다이빙, 다시 돌아온 프로모 등 더욱 방대해진 게임 플레이!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Celebrate The Bloodline in Showcase. Compete online in MyGM. Expanded gameplay includes intergender wrestling, chain wrestling, barricade diving, the return of Promos + much more!

reviewHighlights.text: So I spent several hours into creating a wrestler for My Rise game mode... and the game decided to crash. We knew the game was bad, but not this bad....
Very fun and silly game. The character creator has plenty of options, and the community creations are really good. The options for wrestlers are great...
